update PAPERINFO
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

ENDDATE = #{enddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DURATION = #{duration,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTALSCORE = #{totalscore,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
